title: Looking for determined duo partner to climb out of bronze
body:
Hi, I am currently in b4 and I'm looking for a duo partner to climb up to at least silver.
I can play all positions fairly well but my preference is mid>top>sup>adc>jg and I own all champs.
I'm able to play almost everyday at night. So add me if you are keen. Looking forward to see you on the rift. ^-^

replies.body: Hey, I'm looking for a duo partner currently also, I'm b4 too. I main adc and supp, I can mid pretty well also. Looking to get back into silver :) Add Axivia if you're still interested.
Add up, I main mid and support ;) I love helping people who are nice!
hi dude, im b5 hit me up
Hey bud, im already in silver, but im willing to help, can play any role, own all champions and have played a large majority of them. Just send me a friend request if ya want :)

hey, i could be that person, i can play most weekends
i can play anywhere but prefer to play mid, top or jg
Ill be able to play most of the weekends i mostly adc and would love to join if i have a good support
